Summary: low, silent, large, slow moving, black triangle, lights down each side
divs: sighting details8\11\11 now this was some time ago, and having been so long my date and time of day are entirely approximated, however i am certain of what i saw and many of the details are still with me in my memory. about four years ago and during the middle of the afternoon i left my house and began driving on a road just around the corner. i reached the first stop sign, no more than a minute away from my house, and saw something above me in the sky. now i don't know if it was shock, or panic, or disbelief, but i was in such a frantic hurry to step out of my car and get a better look that the second my hand found the door handle i literally fell out of the side of my car and onto the road. i stood up and watched as an enormous black triangle moved away from me, traveling in the opposite direction that my car was facing. i remember it as being very low to the ground, and surprisingly silent. it was moving so slowly that i couldn't believe it to be any sort of conventional aircraft. down the bottom of each side were (maybe four?) round lights. i stood and watched as it moved slowly away from me, at which point my memory of the sighting is finished. i cannot recall if i watched it travel out of sight, or if it simply disappeared as it does as i try to relive the experience in my head today. i remember being in such a state of shock throughout the event that any notion of taking a picture with my cell phone never occurred to me. immediately afterwards, however, i saved whatever details i could into my cell phone as a draft to the person i had been texting with most recently. this was because i was so hurried in preserving what i could that i simply opened the fastest medium on which i could record. the words i saved read something like "low, silent, black triangle, lights down each side." i then returned to my car, turned around, and drove straight back home. any intentions of continuing to wherever i was heading were completely forgotten. i told a few people, namely my parents and a couple of friends, what i had seen, but i was just met with skepticism and a condescending disbelief. i haven't talked about it much since then, however i have seen remarkably similar images portrayed on various ufo sighting tv shows. in fact, i just finished watching one which put the incident back into the front of my mind, and now i feel so compelled to share the encounter with someone who might put the information to use that it has been driving me crazy for the past hour or so. if i find the cell phone on which i saved the draft, i will also find the specific date and time of the incident. i haven't even tried searching since i am currently so obsessed with getting this out. i hope my description helps, and i would appreciate it if anybody with additional or relevant information might contact me.
